title: Ringo1
author: Ringo1
content: Anyone noticed this coin? Been advertised hevilty

comments.author: 2Pizza410000BTC
comments.body: Yes I have heard and noticed this coin. But after your presentation here I researched to know better and found that Retic Finance raised $1 million in 9 days. Looking at the way people invest, it is assumed that if this coin is listed in a good exchange, it will be listed with a good price. This coin can currently be bought for $0.04 if you want to buy it from pre sale price. I will not tell anyone to invest in this coin, just search better if you want to know.Pic screenshot by CryptoNewsLand website

comments.author: MAAManda
comments.body: Quote from: Ringo1 on December 16, 2023, 09:39:48 AMAnyone noticed this coin? Been advertised heviltyWhat's the point of the short topic that you created?You don't convey one of your points here so that makes this topic just a shit topic. In the future, it would be better if you conveyed the important points of what you conveyed, for example: Retik Finance succeeded in reaching $1M in funding, so a new discussion will emerge that better and more weighty.

comments.author: goaldigger
comments.body: Quote from: Ringo1 on December 16, 2023, 09:39:48 AMAnyone noticed this coin? Been advertised heviltyProbably not advertised here in the forum that much but i see this in social media.I see the hype and the usual trend for a new project, I’ll take cautious here since we all know the hype is there at first but the moment you invest that much that’s the time for the project to dump. Do your own research from time to time and make sure that you look at the opinions of others before investing.

comments.author: kentrolla
comments.body: There has been a huge hype about this coin in social media and I have seen some adverts about the same, I know it's too early to speculate anything but there has been wide speculation that this would grow like Pepe coin. However, it's better we do our own research as it's at the second stage of presale. I would personally be doing more research on it and If satisfied then would go for it with a minimal amount like $50 or so as we are approaching bull run so we may see some coins turning out to be heavily profitable. This time I would try either this coins or some other coin at the presale level.

comments.author: oktana
comments.body: Quote from: MAAManda on December 16, 2023, 03:44:54 PMQuote from: Ringo1 on December 16, 2023, 09:39:48 AMAnyone noticed this coin? Been advertised heviltyWhat's the point of the short topic that you created?You don't convey one of your points here so that makes this topic just a shit topic. In the future, it would be better if you conveyed the important points of what you conveyed, for example: Retik Finance succeeded in reaching $1M in funding, so a new discussion will emerge that better and more weighty.Honestly, the same thing I was wondering. I opened this top hoping to see enough info, to either learn or give our knowledge but it’s just an empty thread as if we are meant to do the research for him/her. Haha. OP. My only words to you is that it isn’t about advertisements, forget about what you see, do your research and know if it is worth investing. Though I have seen a positive review in one of the replies but do your own research by yourself.

comments.author: MAAManda
comments.body: Quote from: oktana on December 16, 2023, 06:03:49 PMQuote from: MAAManda on December 16, 2023, 03:44:54 PMWhat's the point of the short topic that you created?You don't convey one of your points here so that makes this topic just a shit topic. In the future, it would be better if you conveyed the important points of what you conveyed, for example: Retik Finance succeeded in reaching $1M in funding, so a new discussion will emerge that better and more weighty.Honestly, the same thing I was wondering. I opened this top hoping to see enough info, to either learn or give our knowledge but it’s just an empty thread as if we are meant to do the research for him/her. Haha. OP. My only words to you is that it isn’t about advertisements, forget about what you see, do your research and know if it is worth investing. Though I have seen a positive review in one of the replies but do your own research by yourself.Rather than asking other people to provide research and reviews about Retik Finance to the OP, I'm still more convinced that if the OP is making a soft-shill, it's possible that OP has participated in the sale held by Retik so he wants to invite others to buy and become a Retik Finance hodler .BTW, never do soft-shill on this forum, because if the project you share is unclear and only speculative, people here will ignore you.

comments.author: tvplus006
comments.body: Quote from: MAAManda on December 16, 2023, 06:40:12 PMRather than asking other people to provide research and reviews about Retik Finance to the OP, I'm still more convinced that if the OP is making a soft-shill, it's possible that OP has participated in the sale held by Retik so he wants to invite others to buy and become a Retik Finance hodler ...Before investing in Retik finance, take a close look at the OP's profile, which has a negative mark for promoting the pyramid: https://loyce.club/archive/posts/6013/60131803.html And now, after 1.5 years of absence from the forum, the OP reappears here to draw attention to Retik finance. My opinion is that everyone should stay away from such a project, as there is too much chance of losing their money.

comments.author: batang_bitcoin
comments.body: It doesn't show on my browser so that's why I don't see it and don't know that they're heavily advertised. If so, then the algorithm of the browser that I have isn't targeting me. If this project is known and were able to raise a lot for a short period of time, good for them.Quote from: MAAManda on December 16, 2023, 06:40:12 PMRather than asking other people to provide research and reviews about Retik Finance to the OP, I'm still more convinced that if the OP is making a soft-shill, it's possible that OP has participated in the sale held by Retik so he wants to invite others to buy and become a Retik Finance hodler .BTW, never do soft-shill on this forum, because if the project you share is unclear and only speculative, people here will ignore you.Well, this makes sense and you're right. He's able to make us look at the project because we never heard it and that's why I guess he's able to succeed in making us curious about the project but still, I won't invest on it no matter what.

comments.author: btc78
comments.body: I haven’t seen nor heard about this coin until this thread After some research ive found that its listing price is 0.15 usd which is way higher than its current price now people are speculating if it would reach 10 usd next year? Seems a huge difference but it seems it’s offering really good benefits and purposes

comments.author: oktana
comments.body: Just to think that I already assumed it was a good project based on a reply here, it’s not that I planned to invest in it though so I did not do any research because these days, it’s fraustrating what you find. And now hear a comment exposing the project under the sun. Minimum entry of $100? What sort of project is that. Thank you for this, hopefully those who research read this part of the thread and know what they aren’t venturing into.

This is what the forum is for, no?

comments.author: MAAManda
comments.body: Quote from: Ringo1 on December 17, 2023, 01:09:21 PMQuote from: MAAManda on December 16, 2023, 03:44:54 PMQuote from: Ringo1 on December 16, 2023, 09:39:48 AMAnyone noticed this coin? This is what the forum is for, no?True, that's what this forum exists for so we can share information and discuss, but before you make your current statement, you really don't have any points in the topic.IDK about this Retik Finance project, the only thing I know is that they recently reached $1M in funding, that's all. Maybe you can find a better answer from other users responses, I can only give advice if you need to be really careful in choosing a project, $1M isn't a big value for developing a crypto project.

comments.author: BabyBandit
comments.created_time: February 09, 2024, 06:08:25 PMLast edit: February 10, 2024, 12:28:09 AM by BabyBandit
comments.body: Very strange website that Retik and very big promises they give.I tried to buy some for $25 with ETH but it wanted me to pay like $50 in fee (lowest was $45) but when I send from my other wallet to the wallet I wanted to pay with the fee was normal. I guess it some temporary error, why is the fee so high on just that website, one thing is sure they seems to be very eager to sell their tokens.  The more and more I read about this Retik I just get a bad feeling, seems desperate to sell their tokens, and the Retik DeFi Debit Card without any KYC.And they don't share much information the bl.a bl.a on the website.

comments.author: Y3shot
comments.body: Quote from: BabyBandit on February 09, 2024, 06:08:25 PMI guess it some temporary error, why is the fee so high on just that website...It could just a temporary error, but it will be so bad if a new project like the transaction fee is very high. This is a coin that is is still unpredicted in the market,  no one can tell if the coin willl survive ìn the market or not ,  it won't so encouraging for investcor to go for a coin like this with so much high transaction. Normally project like this the gas fee is not suppose to be so high like this.

comments.author: BabyBandit
comments.body: Quote from: Y3shot on February 09, 2024, 06:24:36 PMQuote from: BabyBandit on February 09, 2024, 06:08:25 PMI guess it some temporary error, why is the fee so high on just that website...It could just a temporary error, but it will be so bad if a new project like the transaction fee is very high. This is a coin that is is still unpredicted in the market,  no one can tell if the coin willl survive ìn the market or not ,  it won't so encouraging for investcor to go for a coin like this with so much high transaction. Normally project like this the gas fee is not suppose to be so high like this.Yeah. I just wanted to invest some bucks and see where it leads, but when I saw the gas fees I did not proceed. Not worth it, but I wait until tomorrow and see if it's better.

comments.author: BabyBandit
comments.body: One of the biggest scams 2024! Now its a new scam out there with the exact same website and how they tweet on X called Rexas.Quote from: BabyBandit on November 06, 2024, 01:42:18 AMRexas X link: https://x.com/rexasfinance?t=Suz_OvEd30tpAV_f_KgS9Q&s=09 - Website: https://rexas.com/Retik X link: https://x.com/retikfinance?t=V3WN-cHNN6CqvUUszT_Zyg&s=09 - Website: https://retik.com/ Also on Coingecko: https://www.coingecko.com/sv/coins/retik-financeRetik was one of the biggest crypto scams in 2024 with $32M raised but then they left the project and didn't put any money in the token or the project.So it was a huge scam sadly for the investors, my self was stupid enough too do an investment but nothing that wont hurt my economy so that's fine.And yes it was probably bigger scams but please lets try to stick to the topic.And now a couple of months later its a new project that is exactly the same like Retik with the name Rexas. I am 99% sure it's the same people behind this project and and i am 100% sure this also will end up being a scam.Make your own research and look for yourself and make your own decision! I am only here to warn everyone to not invest in this Rexas because I assure you it will end up in you losing your money and I can guarantee you that!However I think they did dig their own grave now with starting another project, but we all know greed is a very strong and powerful thing right?Probably the money is all gone already (From RETIK) drugs and hookers isn't cheap and now they are desperate and trying this cheap and obvious last pull. I see that more people that me has noticed this also already on X and I hope this will get reported so they can get tracked down once for all.If you have any information about this you can PM me or post down here.I will follow this closely and do what I can do to stop this scam![FYI: The thread will probably be updated quite often, if you have a problem that don't make a post]
